title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. I, pt. 31 - Investments Of Banks Or Trust Companies In Certain Corporations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. I, pt. 31 - Investments Of Banks Or Trust Companies In Certain Corporations

State Regulations
§ 31.1 - Federal national mortgage association; government national mortgage association
§ 31.2 - The depository trust company
§ 31.3 - Distributions by small business investment company of new york, inc. of stock held in its portfolio
§ 31.4 - Student loan marketing association
§ 31.5 - Capital housing rehabilitation corp
§ 31.6 - Battery park city authority
§ 31.7 - Minbanc capital corp
§ 31.8 - Federal agricultural mortgage corporation
§ 31.9 - Government securities clearing corporation
§ 31.10 - Participants trust company
§ 31.11 - Euro-clear clearance system s.c
§ 31.12 - Federal home loan bank of new york
§ 31.13 - Atlantic central bankers bank

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. I, pt. 31

Statutory authority: Banking Law, §§ 14[1][d], 97[5]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
